conbody.p: BricsCAD V21 offers drafting enhancements to help increase your 2D drawing productivity.

section.title: Combine Text to Mtext.
section.p: The new (alias COMBINETEXT) enables you to combine single- and multi-line text into a single MText entity. You can control the behavior for combining text in the Result MText Settings dialog box.

section.title: Arc Aligned Text
section.p: The enables you to view and edit properties for selected Arc Aligned Text entities.

section.title: Find and Replace Text
section.p: The Find and Replace Text dialog box includes new buttons Zoom In and Zoom Out buttons. These enable you to take a closer look at the text within the context of the drawing without having to end the Find and Replace operation.

section.title: Field
section.p: The supports nested formula fields. When you right-click in the Formula field of the Field dialog box, new options enable you to Insert, Edit and Update a field. You can also convert a field to text.
